Params: {3: 'Standing before the massive stellar ring, Ishmael flips through the book in her hands.'}
{3: 'Crimson-gold text quietly appears and vanishes, a new "path" now manifested on the final page.'}
{3: 'Or perhaps, it cannot be called a "miracle".'}
{3: 'The twilight of civilization is now illuminated by countless sparks—Lucia, Gray Raven Commandant, Nanami—'}
{3: 'Countless struggling wills converge at this moment, erupting with a roar that shakes heaven and earth—'}
{3: 'They refuse to meet the end once more.'}
{3: 'The woman with silver pupils reveals a peculiar smile.'}
{3: 'She sees the "sparks" converging in the commandant\'s M.I.N.D.—'}
{3: 'She sees the writings etched into the earth with their bones and blood—'}
{3: 'She sees the roar of the entire civilization—'}
{3: 'Driven by all of this and more, she finally sees the "future" of this civilization.'}
{3: "Given this, she doesn't mind giving them a push."}
{3: 'This may cost her dearly, but a civilization like this deserves a future worth hoping for.'}
{3: 'She is willing to stand alongside this civilization, to witness the ending that is rightfully theirs.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'May the Four-Winged White Raven protect us...'}
{3: 'The sound of metal colliding rings out as she shakes the dice in her hand—'}
